sentences.en: "He used to be so handsome." — "And now?"
sentences.cn: “他以前是那么英俊。”——“那么现在呢？”

sentences.en: a handsome fee
sentences.cn: 一大笔费用

sentences.en: A look of utter confusion swept across his handsome face.
sentences.cn: 他英俊的脸上掠过一丝大惑不解的神情。

sentences.en: a row of handsome Georgian houses
sentences.cn: 一排宏伟的乔治王朝时期的房子

sentences.en: an extremely handsome young man
sentences.cn: 一位特别英俊的年轻人

sentences.en: Armstrong was tall and handsome to the last.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗从来都是这么高大、英俊。

sentences.en: Flynn was still handsome, though dissipated.
sentences.cn: 尽管放荡无度，弗林英俊样貌并未有什么变化。

sentences.en: Handsome, she thought, but not a patch on Alex.
sentences.cn: 是帅，她想，不过比亚历克斯差远了。

sentences.en: He managed to make a handsome profit out of the deal.
sentences.cn: 他从这笔买卖中赚取了丰厚的利润。

sentences.en: He was a handsome blond Nordic type.
sentences.cn: 他属于北欧人那种类型，英俊潇洒，金发碧眼。

sentences.en: He was a slim, solemn, darkly handsome young man.
sentences.cn: 他是个身材修长、表情庄重、皮肤黝黑的帅小伙。

sentences.en: He was fantastically handsome— I just fell for him right away.
sentences.cn: 他帅极了——我一下子就爱上了他。

sentences.en: He was handsome in a raffish kind of way.
sentences.cn: 他的帅是一种放荡不羁的帅。

sentences.en: He was handsome, upright and chivalrous.
sentences.cn: 他长相英俊，为人正直，风度翩翩。

sentences.en: He was six feet tall and ruggedly handsome.
sentences.cn: 他身高6英尺，健壮英俊。

sentences.en: He was startlingly handsome.
sentences.cn: 他帅气逼人。

sentences.en: his handsome face
sentences.cn: 他英俊的脸庞

sentences.en: I stuck out for a handsome redundancy package.
sentences.cn: 我坚持要求得到一大笔裁员补偿。

sentences.en: Marcus was handsome, dynamic and ambitious.
sentences.cn: 马库斯仪表堂堂，精力充沛且雄心勃勃。

sentences.en: Sam was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.cn: 萨姆高大黝黑，相貌堂堂。

sentences.en: The house was a handsome four-story brick structure.
sentences.cn: 这所房子是一幢造型美观的四层砖砌建筑物。

sentences.en: They won a handsome victory in the elections.
sentences.cn: 他们在选举中取得了重大的胜利。

words.tran_cn: 漂亮地；慷慨地；相当大地

trans.tran_cn: 英俊的，健美的，美观的，大方的，数量大的
trans.tran_en: a handsome victory is important and impressive
